### tryCombineInstruction() {#a3eb465a2b7eef72ebd92bf15445c5903}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::LegalizationArtifactCombiner::tryCombineInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeadInsts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselobserverwrapper">GISelObserverWrapper</a> &amp; WrapperObserver)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Try to combine away MI.

Returns true if it combined away the MI. Adds instructions that are dead as a result of the combine into DeadInsts, which can include MI.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h/#l01322">1322</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h">LegalizationArtifactCombiner.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### deleteMarkedDeadInsts() {#a0d17dedd924eed66e10933d33fa7d081}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LegalizationArtifactCombiner::deleteMarkedDeadInsts (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeadInsts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselobserverwrapper">GISelObserverWrapper</a> &amp; WrapperObserver)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Erase the dead instructions in the list and call the observer hooks.

Normally the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizer">Legalizer</a> will deal with erasing instructions that have been marked dead. However, for the trunc(ext(x)) cases we can end up trying to process instructions which have been marked dead, but otherwise break the MIR by introducing multiple vreg defs. For those cases, allow the combines to explicitly delete the instructions before we run into trouble.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h/#l01520">1520</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h">LegalizationArtifactCombiner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>

### isInstUnsupported() {#acceb0ec23b77795db55a5b885dcb2526}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::LegalizationArtifactCombiner::isInstUnsupported (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> &amp; Query) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Checks if the target legalizer info has specified anything about the instruction, or if unsupported.

### markDefDead() {#af17518f3afc618ea647254083ea96570}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LegalizationArtifactCombiner::markDefDead (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; DefMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeadInsts, unsigned DefIdx=0)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Mark a def of one of MI&#39;s original operands, DefMI, as dead if changing MI (either by killing it or changing operands) results in DefMI being dead too.

In-between COPYs or artifact-casts are also collected if they are dead. MI is not marked dead.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h/#l01449">1449</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h">LegalizationArtifactCombiner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### markInstAndDefDead() {#a7bbd60c8700c24ef664169510f2f2179}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::LegalizationArtifactCombiner::markInstAndDefDead (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; DefMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeadInsts, unsigned DefIdx=0)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Mark MI as dead.

If a def of one of MI&#39;s operands, DefMI, would also be dead due to MI being killed, then mark DefMI as dead too. Some of the combines (extends(trunc)), try to walk through redundant copies in between the extends and the truncs, and this attempts to collect the in between copies if they&#39;re dead.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h/#l01507">1507</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizationartifactcombiner-h">LegalizationArtifactCombiner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
